Blackhall Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
blackhall-contest

Happy Memories
Crimden Dene, Blackhall, County Durham Prizes - 1st £8 and cup, 2nd £5, 3rd £2, 4th £1. Hymn tune contest - 1st(£2 and cup) Blyth LNER. March contest - 1st(£1) Cargo Fleet, 2nd(10s.) Blyth. Contest promoted by Blackhall British Legion. 9 bands competed.
Sept. 17, 2013, 9:21 a.m. April 13, 2018, 3:17 p.m.
1 Cargo Fleet Steel Harry Jackson
2 Blyth LNER George Ramsden
3 Brancepeth Welfare Band J. B. Wright
4 Pride Valley Brass C. Devonport
